name: Duplicate taxonomy terms and ACF fields
author: Kresimir Pendic

sections.description: Duplicate any custom taxonomy term, including built-in categories and tags + all ACF fields (all values from old term to new one)
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire duplicate-taxonomy-terms-and-acf-fields content to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the \’Plugins\’ menu in WordPress

In your custom taxonomy edit pages, and you will find new option \’Duplicate\’ for each term in your list. When you click it plugin will duplicate it with suffux \’ copy\’. If you have defined ACF fields for that taxonomy it will also be copied in newly created term.
sections.faq:
Can I copy terms if I don\’t have ACF plugin installed?

Sure, it will only duplicate native WordPress term
